description: meta info used by the wien2k parser.  All names are expected to start with x_wien2k_

metaInfos.description: position of atom x in internal units
metaInfos.name: x_wien2k_atom_pos_x

metaInfos.description: position of atom y in internal units
metaInfos.name: x_wien2k_atom_pos_y

metaInfos.description: position of atom z  in internal units
metaInfos.name: x_wien2k_atom_pos_z

metaInfos.description: name of atom, labelling non-equvalent atoms
metaInfos.name: x_wien2k_atom_name

metaInfos.description: number of radial mesh points
metaInfos.name: x_wien2k_NPT

metaInfos.description: atomic sphere radius (muffin-tin radius)
metaInfos.name: x_wien2k_RMT

metaInfos.description: first radial mesh point
metaInfos.name: x_wien2k_R0

metaInfos.description: atomic number Z
metaInfos.name: x_wien2k_atomic_number_Z

metaInfos.description: header (labels) of wien2k.
metaInfos.name: x_wien2k_header

metaInfos.description: scf iteration number
metaInfos.name: x_wien2k_iteration_number

metaInfos.description: number of inequivalent atoms in the unit cell
metaInfos.name: x_wien2k_nonequiv_atoms

metaInfos.description: exchange-correlation potential, in in0
metaInfos.name: x_wien2k_indxc

metaInfos.description: exchange-correlation potential, in in0
metaInfos.name: x_wien2k_section_XC

metaInfos.description: switch in in0 between TOT, KXC, POT, MULT, COUL, EXCH
metaInfos.name: x_wien2k_switch

metaInfos.description: FFT-mesh parameters in x direction for the calculation of the XC-potential in the interstitial region, in in0
metaInfos.name: x_wien2k_ifft_x

metaInfos.description: FFT-mesh parameters in y direction for the calculation of the XC-potential in the interstitial region, in in0
metaInfos.name: x_wien2k_ifft_y

metaInfos.description: FFT-mesh parameters in z direction for the calculation of the XC-potential in the interstitial region, in in0
metaInfos.name: x_wien2k_ifft_z

metaInfos.description: Multiplicative factor to the IFFT grid, in in0
metaInfos.name: x_wien2k_ifft_factor

metaInfos.description: optional print switch, in in0
metaInfos.name: x_wien2k_iprint

metaInfos.description: wave function switch between WFFIL, SUPWF, WPPRI
metaInfos.name: x_wien2k_wf_switch

metaInfos.description: RmtKmax - determines matrix size (convergence), where Kmax is the plane wave cut-off, Rmt is the smallest of all atomic sphere radii
metaInfos.name: x_wien2k_rkmax

metaInfos.description: switch, in in2c between (TOT,FOR,QTL,EFG,ALM,CLM,FERMI)
metaInfos.name: x_wien2k_in2c_switch

metaInfos.description: lower energy cut-off for defining the range of occupied states; in in2c
metaInfos.name: x_wien2k_in2c_emin

metaInfos.description: number of electrons (per unit cell) in given energy range in in2c
metaInfos.name: x_wien2k_in2c_ne

metaInfos.description: LAPW2 tries to find the .mean. energies for each l channel, for both the valence and the semicore states. To define .valence. and .semicore. it starts at (EF - .esepermin.) and searches for a .gap. with a width of at least .eseper0. and defines this as separation energy of valence and semicore; in in2c
metaInfos.name: x_wien2k_in2c_espermin

metaInfos.description: minimum gap width; in in2c
metaInfos.name: x_wien2k_in2c_esper0

metaInfos.description: determines how EF is determined; in in2c
metaInfos.name: x_wien2k_smearing_kind

metaInfos.description: specifies the width of the broadening, if efmod is set to ALL, eval specifies the upper limit of the energy window; in in2c
metaInfos.name: x_wien2k_smearing_width

metaInfos.description: max. G (magnitude of largest vector) in charge density Fourier expansion; in in2c
metaInfos.name: x_wien2k_in2c_gmax

metaInfos.description: number of independent atoms in the cell
metaInfos.name: x_wien2k_nr_of_independent_atoms

metaInfos.description: exchange correlation potential option
metaInfos.name: x_wien2k_potential_option

metaInfos.description: Release date of wien2k.
metaInfos.name: x_wien2k_release_date

metaInfos.description: section containing a class of equivalent atoms
metaInfos.name: x_wien2k_section_equiv_atoms

metaInfos.description: user given name for this system given in the struct file
metaInfos.name: x_wien2k_system_nameIn

metaInfos.description: user given name for this system
metaInfos.name: x_wien2k_system_name

metaInfos.description: relativistic or nonrelativistic calculation mode
metaInfos.name: x_wien2k_calc_mode

metaInfos.name: x_wien2k_angle_between_unit_axis_gamma

metaInfos.name: x_wien2k_total_atoms

metaInfos.name: x_wien2k_lattice_const_c

metaInfos.name: x_wien2k_unit_cell_volume_bohr3

metaInfos.description: energy total
metaInfos.name: x_wien2k_energy_total

metaInfos.description: Fermi energy
metaInfos.name: x_wien2k_fermi_ene

metaInfos.description: number of electrons
metaInfos.name: x_wien2k_noe

metaInfos.description: number of k-points
metaInfos.name: x_wien2k_nr_kpts

metaInfos.description: Potential and charge cut-off, Ry**.5
metaInfos.name: x_wien2k_cutoff

metaInfos.description: energy gap in Ry

metaInfos.name: x_wien2k_ene_gap_eV

metaInfos.name: x_wien2k_matrix_size

metaInfos.name: x_wien2k_rkm

metaInfos.name: x_wien2k_LOs

metaInfos.name: x_wien2k_mmtot

metaInfos.name: x_wien2k_mmint

metaInfos.description: magnetic moment inside the sphere
metaInfos.name: x_wien2k_mmi001

metaInfos.description: charge distance between last 2 iterations
metaInfos.name: x_wien2k_charge_distance

metaInfos.description: force on atom xx in mRy/bohr (in the local (for each atom) cartesian coordinate system): |F|
metaInfos.name: x_wien2k_for_abs

metaInfos.name: x_wien2k_for_x

metaInfos.description: force on atom xx in mRy/bohr (in the global coordinate system of the unit cell (in the same way as the atomic positions are specified)): Fz

metaInfos.name: x_wien2k_atom_nr

metaInfos.description: number of sphere, labelling spheres
metaInfos.name: x_wien2k_sphere_nr

metaInfos.description: total difference charge density for atom xx between last 2 iterations
metaInfos.name: x_wien2k_tot_diff_charge

metaInfos.description: total interstitial charge (mixed after MIXER)
metaInfos.name: x_wien2k_tot_int_charge

metaInfos.description: total charge in sphere xx (mixed after MIXER)
metaInfos.name: x_wien2k_tot_charge_in_sphere

metaInfos.description: total interstitial charge (new (not mixed) from LAPW2+LCORE
metaInfos.name: x_wien2k_tot_int_charge_nm

metaInfos.name: x_wien2k_tot_charge_in_sphere_nm

metaInfos.name: x_wien2k_tot_val_charge_cell

metaInfos.description: total valence charge in sphere xx
metaInfos.name: x_wien2k_tot_val_charge_sphere

metaInfos.description: density for atom xx at the nucleus (first radial mesh point); valence
metaInfos.name: x_wien2k_density_at_nucleus_valence

metaInfos.description: density for atom xx at the nucleus (first radial mesh point); semi-core
metaInfos.name: x_wien2k_density_at_nucleus_semicore

metaInfos.description: density for atom xx at the nucleus (first radial mesh point); core
metaInfos.name: x_wien2k_density_at_nucleus_core

metaInfos.description: density for atom xx at the nucleus (first radial mesh point); total
metaInfos.name: x_wien2k_density_at_nucleus_tot

metaInfos.description: nuclear and electronic charge; normalization check of electronic charge densities. If a significant amount of electrons is missing, one might have core states, whose charge density is not completely confined within the respective atomic sphere. In such a case the corresponding states should be treated as band states (using LOs).
metaInfos.name: x_wien2k_nuclear_charge

metaInfos.description: nuclear and electronic charge; normalization check of electronic charge densities. If a significant amount of electrons is missing, one might have core states, whose charge density is not completely confined within the respective atomic sphere. In such a case the corresponding states should be treated as band states (using LOs).
metaInfos.name: x_wien2k_electronic_charge

metaInfos.description: number of the nec test, labelling nec
metaInfos.name: x_wien2k_necnr

metaInfos.description: Version of WIEN2k.
metaInfos.name: x_wien2k_version
